name: EREMIC (Demo)
description:
In a dreamlike limbo, two lone fox siblings embark upon their quest to find a mysterious creature called the soul shepherd.

Embracing their differences and using them to their advantage, they are capable of overcoming even the biggest obstacles.

Working together is the key on their path through a vast desert with its ancient ruins and bone remains.

________

Play this game together with your friend - or even foe - next to you, so you can free the foxes' souls at the very top of the tower and finally give them their peaceful rest.

The game was created within 48 hours of the second official #frankengamejam2019. The topic was "Let's go back to the couch", so we developed a puzzle game is played via Splitscreen.

Please note that due to a bug the game may show a fatal error on the first launch but it will work without any issues afterwards.

_________

Controls

(Recommended: use 2 Controllers OR 1 Controller and 1 Keyboard + Mouse)

Please note that in order to play with two controllers you will have to download the TwoController version of the game (64 bit only) for now. I'm still working on a better solution.

Controller:

right stick to move left stick for camera A to jump X to Interact Y to use Sonar and uncover the murals start to open exit menu

Keyboard:

Player1:

W, A, S, D to move Mouse to look around Q to use Sonar and uncover the murals E to Interact ESC to open exit menu

Player2 (NOT recommended but kinda working):

Arrow Keys to Move Numpad Keys to look around Enter to jump Shift to Interact Ctrl to use Sonar and uncover the murals
